name: Advanced Mathematics
description: Advanced Mathematics builds on foundational mathematical principles and introduces higher-level concepts used in science, engineering, technology, and economics. The subject emphasizes analytical thinking, problem-solving, and logical reasoning through both theoretical and applied mathematics.
learningOutcomes: Apply calculus techniques to solve real-world problems
Analyze and interpret complex mathematical models
Demonstrate proficiency in algebraic and graphical methods
Develop logical reasoning and critical thinking skills
Use mathematics to support learning in science and technology subjects
recommendedFor: Learners interested in engineering, medicine, economics, or technology
Students preparing for advanced tertiary-level mathematics
